"This book collects the B.P.R.D. The Dead comic book series issues 1-5, published by Dark Horse Comics and the story "B.P.R.D. Born Again" from the Hellboy Premiere Edition published by Dark Horse Comics and Gareb Shamus Enterprises"

Summary Abe Sapien has a personal paranormal experience when he comes home to a drowned wife. Then, with the plague of frogs escalating, the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense moves their task force into an abandoned government research station where they find a mad Nazi scientist who has been trapped there for fifty years.

178.heading: Ardor, Dale.
178.title: Flesh Gordon [videorecording]
178.author: presented by Hen's Tooth Video and by Mammoth Films.
notes: Collector's ed.
1 videocassette (90 min.) : sd., col. ; 1/2 in.
VHS.
First issued 1974 as a motion picture.
Cast: Jason Williams, Suzanne Fields, Joseph Hudgins, William Hunt, John Hoyt as Professor Gordon.

Summary: "In this popular outrageous spoof of sci-fi films, Earth is thrown onto carnal chaos by a mysterious sex ray emanating from outer space. Flesh Gordon, Dale Ardor and their new found friend Dr. Flexi Jerkoff, must travel to the planet Porno to save Earth from certain devastation by the mad Emperor Wang. Includes 10 minutes of previously unseen footage and original trailer.
"This program contains mature subject matter. It is intended for viewing by adult audiences, 18 years and older."
